item.description:
Please join us for a tour of Tory's seaside garden followed by a foraging adventure along the Atlantic Pathway in Rockport! This is a magical spot that will replenish you with the energies of sea and earth.

First we'll meet at Tory's place and have a tour of her garden where she is growing delicious, organic foods in raised beds on a granite outcropping overlooking the ocean.

We'll follow up with a foraging walk along the beautiful Atlantic Pathway where we will find wild grapes, angelica, watercress, edible seaweeds and more!

The loose agenda:
12:00- Meet and greet in the front garden
12:15- Tour the raised bed gardens and discuss growing in less than perfect conditions
12:45- Walk down to the Atlantic Pathway and see what's growing in the wild
2:00ish- Share a snack in Tory's garden
2:30ish- Wrap up and possibly help with a small garden project

Please bring:
A bag or basket for harvesting and a pocket knife or trowel
Appropriate shoes and clothing for potentially muddy conditions
A change of clothes if you want to harvest seaweed...and footwear for slippery rocks
A snack to share with the group
Your camera to share photos of this incredible location
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be hanging around in the front garden
item.name: Garden Tour and Seaside Foraging
